str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To accuse, charge, prosecute. From kategoros; to be a plaintiff, i.e. To charge with some offence.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To watch, observe scrupulously. From para and tereo; to inspect alongside, i.e. Note insidiously or scrupulously.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as therapon; to wait upon menially, i.e. to adore, or to relieve.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
